column2: 1=Participant is unable to complete the GDS(Geriatric DEpression Scale) based on the clinician's best judgement.
2. Have you dropped many of your activities and interests? 1=Yes(1); 0=No(0)
3. Do you feel that your life is empty? 1=Yes(1); 0=No(0)
5. Are you in good spirits most of the time? 1=Yes
6. Are you afraid that something bad is going to happen to you?1=Yes
7. Do you feel happy most of the time?1=Yes(0)
9. Do you prefer to stay at home, rather than going out and doing new things?1=Yes(1)
10. Do you feel you have more problems with memory than most?1=Yes(1)
11. Do you think its wonderful to be alive now?1=Yes(1)
12. Do you feel pretty worthless the way you are now?1=Yes(1)
13. Do you feel full of energy?1=Yes(0)
14. Do you feel that your situation is hopeless?1=Yes(1)
15. Do you think that most people are better off than you are?1=Yes(1)
